PublicDescription: A directory write to the Level-1 Data cache where the line was originally in a Read-Only state in the cache but has been updated to be in the Exclusive state that allows stores to the cache line
A translation has been written into The Translation Lookaside Buffer 2 (TLB2) and the request was made by the data cache
A TLB2 miss is in progress for a request made by the data cache. Incremented by one for every TLB2 miss in progress for the Level-1 Data cache on this cycle
A translation entry was written into the Combined Region and Segment Table Entry array in the Level-2 TLB for a one-megabyte page or a Last Host Translation was done
A translation entry for a two-gigabyte page was written into the Level-2 TLB
A directory write to the Level-1 Data cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from the Level-2 Data cache
A translation entry has been written into the Translation Lookaside Buffer 2 (TLB2) and the request was made by the instruction cache
A TLB2 miss is in progress for a request made by the instruction cache. Incremented by one for every TLB2 miss in progress for the Level-1 Instruction cache in a cycle
A directory write to the Level-1 Instruction cache directory where the returned cache line was sourced from the Level-2 Instruction cache
A translation entry was written into the Page Table Entry array in the Level-2 TLB
Translation entries were written into the Combined Region and Segment Table Entry array and the Page Table Entry array in the Level-2 TLB
The number of Level-2 TLB translation engines busy in a cycle
